item.title: My Emacs Init File

item.title: Mac Jekyll Note
item.description: 1. A little problem Learning from youtube In terminal (using Python 2.7 instead of Python 3.4) install vertualenv {% highlight R %} pip install virtualenv {% endhighlight R %} using Python 2.7 as temporary virtualenv -p /usr/bin/python2.7 –distribute temp-python active Python 2.7 source temp-python/bin/activate stop using python2.7 deactivate 2. Start Jekyll Then begin jekyll in your workspace jekyll new blogname jekyll serve
